org.apache.taverna.server.master.common

Class Uri.Rewriter

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.taverna.server.master.common.Uri.Rewriter
  • Enclosing class:
    Uri

    public static class Uri.Rewriter
extends Object
    A bean that allows configuration of how to rewrite generated URIs to be secure.
    Author:
    Donal Fellows
